question:
Is the following statement something you would say?
"Sports are not important and a waste of time"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Playing and watching sports provides me with more excitement and enjoyment than almost anything else"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Sports are such a big part of my life"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am generally not at all interested in sports"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Games and sports are unimportant"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"When the big sporting event comes around, I am always very interested in watching it"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Games are pointless and a waste of time"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I find sports boring"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I dedicate a lot of my free time to being involved in sports activities and following up with news"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Sports don’t matter at all"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Putting extra effort into training leads to success"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I don't enjoy sports at all"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I love watching my favorite sports teams play"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Sports are not interesting to me; I get nothing out of watching sports events"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I have favorite professional or college sports teams that I root for or against"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Sports teaches good values like teamwork, discipline, and motivation"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I love following sports, and they are my greatest passion"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Exercise is really boring"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Watching and playing sports seem like a waste of time"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I will watch a game or competition involving my favorite sport or team any chance I get"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I really enjoy watching sports or competing in sports"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am not at all interested in watching sporting events"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Sports and physical activity are extremely important to me"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I don't care at all about sports"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Going to games fills me with great excitement, energy and passion"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I love watching sports, and prefer to watching sports over most other forms of entertainment"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Sports are a waste of time, and of no real value to society"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Sports are boring and a waste of time"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Physical activity is necessary for a healthy lifestyle"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Exercise (or playing sports) is a great stress reliever and a good priority for life satisfaction and balance"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I think playing sports are a waste of time and not healthy for me"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Watching sports inspires and excites me in a way that few other things do"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Sports are important for allowing people to get into better shape, and to better manage stress"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Few things give me more enjoyment than sports"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Winning at competitive sports is a great feeling"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I prefer to spend as much time as possible enjoying sports, either as a participant or as a spectator"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I find sports to be boring"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I'm a huge sports fan and I really enjoy sports"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I love being active in sports and engaging in competition"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Exercising is not at all important"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I dislike watching or playing sports"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"My favorite part of weekend is watching or playing sports"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I love watching live games and following live scores"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I don't enjoy playing or watching any sports"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I dislike most sporting events"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am really passionate about sports and follow games closely"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I think sports are exciting and they are a great way to spend one's time"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I always look forward to watching live sports games"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Sports are important in my life"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I hardly care about sports"
